name: Red Javelin Communications

overview:

Differentiated by an 100% senior team, deep knowledge of technology markets, virtual model and strong marketing expertise, Red Javelin is able to quickly and more effectively make an impact while at the same time fit the budgets of todayâ€™s emerging-growth companies.

With a client base ranging from emerging start-ups, web applications, online consumer, enterprise solutions and blue chip corporations, the all-senior Red Javelin team becomes an extension of your marketing organization. No one can beat our value and results.
